detail_desc: V-neck blouse in a textured weave with print stripes. Wrapover front with a tie at the side and long sleeves with wide cuffs.
Stylish flip-flops with soft, lightly padded leather straps and leather insoles.
Twill jumpsuit with elastication and a flounce at the top. Tie-top shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in stretch cotton jersey with a collar and button placket. Slim fit.

Nursing vest top, a short-sleeved nursing top and a poncho in soft jersey. Vest top with a double-layered top. Top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access. The poncho is open at the front and can be worn over either the vest top or short-sleeved top.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Wide, ankle-length trousers in sturdy cotton canvas with a low waist, low crotch, button fly, front pockets and welt back pockets. Tapered legs that have sewn-on panels with decorative seams, and lacing lower down at the sides to the hems.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.
Fully lined swimsuit with an all-over print, narrow shoulder straps and gathers at the top.
Leggings in jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist. The cotton content of the leggings is organic.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a bow at the top.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.

Long dress in airy, softly draping chiffon. Narrow cut at the top, short shoulder straps and a V-neck opening at the back. Bodice with pleats to create a draped effect, a concealed zip at the back and a seam at the waist with concealed, adjustable elastication. Gently flared skirt with a double layer of chiffon to create volume and soft draping. Satin lining.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Waist-high thong briefs in ribbed jersey with a V-shaped waist, narrow sides and lined gusset.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with a ribbed turtle neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long, high-waisted skirt in a viscose weave with covered elastication at the waist and gathered seams creating tiers at the thighs and knees for added width. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.

Short, padded jacket in woven fabric with a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, a concealed drawstring at the waist, and elastication and a tab and press-stud at the hem. Quilted lining. Polyester filling.
5-pocket trousers in superstretch twill with a regular waist and skinny legs.
Large hair clips in metal decorated with glass beads. Length 9 cm.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbing at the cuffs.
Fully lined tankini top with padded cups, a fake wrapover with draping at the top and a racer back. Concealed elastication under the bust and four narrow shoulder straps that are braided at the back.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend containing some cashmere.
Shorts woven in stretch twill with a slight sheen. High waist with pleats at the top, a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and short legs. Unlined.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Sock boots in Tencel™ lyocell and recycled polyester with pointed toes, a loop at the back and kitten heels. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5 cm.
Blouse in airy cotton voile with a small frilled collar and concealed button placket. Gathered yoke front and back and short, butterfly sleeves. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy weave. High waist with elasticated smocking, side pockets and straight, wide legs. Lined.
Trainers in mesh and imitation leather with a padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Jersey linings, mesh insoles and chunky soles.
Three-strand necklace in metal chains of various designs, two with a rhinestone-decorated pendant. Adjustable length.
Wide hairband in cotton jersey with a twisted detail.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a sewn-on bow tie and an appliqué in the shape of a waistcoat with decorative buttons at the front. Press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Knee-length sports shorts in fast-drying mesh with an elasticated drawstring waist. Unlined.

LIMITED EDITION. Kaftan in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and visible seam down the front. Long fringes at the cuffs, a pleat at the back for added movement and drape, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Fitted, double-breasted jacket in a slightly stretchy weave with notch lapels, welt front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with short sleeves, elastication at the top and slits with ties at the sides. Unlined.
Loose-fitting, V-neck T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.

Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in sturdy felted fabric with large notch lapels, dropped shoulders and wide, gently tapered sleeves. Diagonal pockets at the front and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Sandals in imitation leather with an appliqué on the front, ankle strap with a hook and loop tab and a loop at the back. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and open chest pocket.
Joggers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and covered elastic at the hems.
Skirt in crinkled, patterned jersey with a decorative knot detail at the top and a high slit at the front of the hem. Unlined.

Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood with a ribbed edge and drawstring at the front. Low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, a kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide hairband in cotton jersey with a twisted detail.
Short dress in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Sewn-on tie belt at the waist, flap chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Cap in cotton twill with an embroidered appliqué on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Calf-length dress in a cotton and viscose weave with embroidery and inset lace trims. Scalloped V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, seam with a lace trim at the waist and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an interactive appliqué on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Jacquard-weave playsuit with a wrapover front, a deep V-neck with pleats at the front, and an elasticated waist with ties at one side. Opening at the back with a covered button at the back of the neck and long puff sleeves with a covered button at the cuffs.
Jumpsuit in jersey with draping. Deep V-neck, wrapover top, gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and straight, wide legs.
5-pocket jeans in hard-washed denim made from a cotton blend. High waist with pleats at the top, a zip fly and button, and wide, gently tapered legs.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with an appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow, detachable shoulder strap, flap with a magnetic fastener, and two inner compartments. Lined. Size 15x20 cm.
Long-sleeved jumper in a loose-knit linen blend with a deep V-neck, dropped shoulders and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy, patterned viscose weave with elastication at the back of the waist and a fabric tie belt at the front. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Espadrilles in cotton canvas with sequins, elastic gores in the sides and a braided jute trim around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Hi-tops with a padded shaft, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a small loop at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles, and patterned soles.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with hole-knit details, long raglan sleeves, slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3.5 cm.

Slim-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), and a zip fly and button. Coin pocket, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves.
Fitted, short-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey.
Cardigan knitted in a soft wool blend containing some alpaca with a V-neck, buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Elasticated knit trim at the cuffs and hem.

Long dress in an airy weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Frills down the front that continue down the back, long dolman sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Jersey underdress.
Boots in stretch jersey with a sheen. Thigh-high shaft that is elasticated at the top, open toes and imitation leather insoles. Heel 9 cm.
5-pocket, slim-fit trousers in soft, superstretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.

Triangle bikini top with removable inserts and narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Wavy, overlocked edges and a wide elasticated hem with an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Imitation suede mules with covered heels and scalloped, crossover foot straps. Imitation leather insoles and fluted soles. Heels approx 3.5 cm.

Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with lace trims and embroidery at the top. Small stand-up collar with a frill trim and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Yoke with a lace trim at the front and gathers at the back. Frill trim at the shoulders, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs with frill trims. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in soft jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-4Y with normal sequins), seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Blouse in an airy plumeti weave made from a cotton blend with a grandad collar and concealed buttons at the front. Long balloon sleeves with an embroidered section and narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Hair clips in metal and plastic. Width 0.5 cm, length 6 cm.
